Module cs230
Package cs230.profiles

Class ProfileManager

java.lang.Object
cs230.profiles.ProfileManager
public class ProfileManager extends Object
Profile manager is used to handle profiles - add, delete etc.
Author:
Dafydd-Rhys Maund
